name: Weatherless
description:
Weatherless

Welcome to Weatherless, in this game you take on the role of the Anatolian God of Weather, who controls every aspect of Anatolian Society and of course, its weather. 

You are tasked with building a city for yourself, however, there are no limits other than the resources you need to build. 

There are 2 Gamemodes, Sandbox and Campaign. The difference, is that in the Campaign or New Game, you must rely on resources and gain more and keep your people safe or you lose. Whereas in Sandbox, you have no limits, you can destroy the city, build away with no resources needed and so much more.

The game will allow you to take control of the destiny of the city you build, whether you can build it then destroy it, defend it from invaders. You will also be able to decide between 2 modes, one will give you limits and one will give you absolute freedom.

Set in the ancient Roman time period, Weatherless takes place during the Roman invasion of Anatolia in 129 AD.

Features

  • Variety of Buildings to Choose from
  • Endless hours of Gameplay
  • Random Events
  • Disasters Caused by Player
  • Stunning Low-Poly Visuals
  • Defend against Roman Sieges and Creature attacks
  • Forts, Walls, Barracks and more
  • Policy choices
  • Democracy or Dictatorship
